definition: lit. to ruin the enterprise for the sake of one basketful/to fail through lack of a final effort/to spoil the ship for a ha'penny worth of tar (idiom)
meritorious deed or service/achievement/result/service/accomplishment/work (physics)
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
basket for carrying soil

sentences.english: Will the Lakers three-peat, or will they fall short?
sentences.chinese: 湖人是会三连冠，还是会功亏一篑？

sentences.english: Any leak would have ruined the entire mission.
sentences.chinese: 只要当中任何一个人泄露，整个任务就会功亏一篑。

sentences.english: What if this and that happens which completely ruins all of your efforts?
sentences.chinese: 如果某件事让你的努力功亏一篑怎么办呢？

sentences.english: The fall short of players named wang, 007.
sentences.chinese: 这位功亏一篑的007号队员名叫王星。

sentences.english: Just one hiccup could destroy a carving in progress.
sentences.chinese: 在雕刻中打个嗝可能都会让你功亏一篑。

definition: to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
basket for carrying soil
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
(literary) to be routed (in a war)/to suffer defeat (in sports etc)
to come to nothing (idiom)
to return without any achievement (idiom); to go home with one's tail between one's legs
wasted effort
to commit to the waters (idiom); to lose sth irrevocably
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
to work to no avail (idiom)
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
to overreach oneself/to try to be clever and end up with egg on one's face
to meet with unexpected failure (idiom)/to fail miserably (where failure was not expected)
to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished
narrowly/almost/nearly
win or lose, it all ends here/this is the moment to shine
pinyin: cheng2 bai4 zai4 ci3 yi1 ju3
